pages.text: Knives are an essential, multi-use tool that also act as a weapon.$(br2)$(info) They can be made of a variety of materials, and the material determines durability and the amount of damage dealt.

Knives are used for a variety of purposes. The primary use involves scraping $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra moss$() from eligible stone, either by hand or with a dispenser.$(br2)They can also break logs to produce $(l:resources/bark)bark$(), the Fortune enchant impacting the quantity.

In addition to the previously mentioned uses, knives are also used to activate a number of devices.$(br2)$(l:crafting/fey_crafter)Fey crafters$() and $(l:crafting/runic_crafter)runic crafter$() are right-clicked with a knife to begin crafting, either by hand or with a dispenser.$(br2)$(l:crafting/pyres)Pyres$() with a valid ritual can be right-clicked $(bold)while sneaking$() to $(l:rituals/visualisation)display the range of the relevant ritual$().$(br2)The $(l:crafting/imposer)imposer$() is activated by right-clicking with a knife.
When holding $(l:herbs)wildroot$() in the off-hand, right-clicking an eligible $(l:rituals/standing_stones)log converts it into runed wood$().
